name: Barrel Ninja
description:
Jump up on the conveyor belt.
Master throws barrels at you.
Jump over as many as you can.
Be careful the conveyor belt pulls you back fast.
Tap twice to flip.
Always listen to Master. He knows best.
Become the next Barrel Ninja.

simple.
fun.
addictive.
enjoy.

#barrelninja

Make sure to tell everyone that you are the best Barrel Ninja ever, and they will never beat your score.
